notes:
This dataset contains South Sudan data for the Map Explorer that is derived from other data.  
WARNING: Derived data - go to original sources!  
Sources:  
[South Sudan Administrative Boundaries](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/south-sudan-administrative-boundaries)  
[2017 Humanitarian Needs Overview for South Sudan](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/south-sudan-humanitarian-needs-overview-2017)  
[ACLED Conflict Data for Africa Realtime 2017](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/acled-conflict-data-for-africa-realtime-2017)  
[ACLED Conflict Data for Africa 1997-2016](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/acled-conflict-data-for-africa-1997-2016)  
[WFP VAM MarketMonitor](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/market-monitor)  
[CBPF Allocations and Contributions](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/cbpf-allocations-and-contributions)
